languages.text: While the Commissar's ally is under the effects of {g|f:cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}At All Costs!{/g}, that ally suffers +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} but gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} (instead of +1 AP and +3 MP).
languages.original_text: Когда союзник комиссара получает эффект от способности Задать им жару!, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, наносимый этому союзнику, увеличивается на 50%, но также этот союзник получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} (вместо +1 ОД и +3 ОП).

traits.locale_text: While the Commissar's ally is under the effects of At All Costs!, that ally suffers +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} but gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} (instead of +1 AP and +3 MP).

While the Commissar's ally is under the effects of At All Costs!, that ally suffers +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} but gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} (instead of +1 AP and +3 MP).

While the Commissar's ally is under the effects of At All Costs!, that ally suffers +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} but gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} (instead of +1 AP and +3 MP).

languages.text: Solange der Verbündete des Kommissars unter der Wirkung von {g|f:cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}Um jeden Preis!{/g} steht, erleidet dieser Verbündete +50 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, erhält aber +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} (statt +1 AP und +3 BP).
languages.original_text: While the Commissar's ally is under the effects of {g|f:cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}At All Costs!{/g}, that ally suffers +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} but gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} (instead of +1 AP and +3 MP).

traits.locale_text: Solange der Verbündete des Kommissars unter der Wirkung von Machen wir ihnen die Hölle heiß steht, erleidet dieser Verbündete +50% Schaden, erhält aber +2 AP und +4 BP (statt +1 AP und +3 BP).

languages.text: Tant que l'allié du commissaire est sous l'effet de {g|f:cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}Coûte que coûte !{/g}, il subit +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, mais bénéficie de +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} (au lieu de +1 PA et +3 PD).
languages.original_text: While the Commissar's ally is under the effects of {g|f:cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}At All Costs!{/g}, that ally suffers +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} but gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} (instead of +1 AP and +3 MP).

traits.locale_text: Tant que l'allié du commissaire est sous l'effet de Coûte que coûte !, il subit +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, mais bénéficie de +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} (au lieu de +1 PA et +3 PD).

languages.text: 当政委的盟友受到{g|f:cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}排除万难！{/g}效果影响时，该盟友受到的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}会提高50%，但会获得+2{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与+4{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}（而非+1行动点数与+3移动点数）。
languages.original_text: While the Commissar's ally is under the effects of {g|f:cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}At All Costs!{/g}, that ally suffers +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} but gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} (instead of +1 AP and +3 MP).

traits.locale_text: 当政委的盟友受到杀光他们效果影响时，该盟友受到的伤害会提高50%，但会获得+2行动点数与+4移动点数（而非+1行动点数与+3移动点数）。

languages.text: Cuando un aliado del comisario se beneficia de los efectos de {g|f:cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}¡A cualquier precio!{/g}, el aliado sufre un +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} pero gana +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} (en vez de +1 PA y +3 PM).
languages.original_text: While the Commissar's ally is under the effects of {g|f:cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}At All Costs!{/g}, that ally suffers +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} but gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} (instead of +1 AP and +3 MP).

traits.locale_text: Cuando un aliado del comisario se beneficia de los efectos de Mandémosles al infierno, el aliado sufre un +50 % de daño pero gana +2 PA y +4 PM (en vez de +1 PA y +3 PM).

languages.text: コミッサーの味方がどんな犠牲を払っても！の効果を受けている間、その味方は被{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+50%されるが、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が+2、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+4される（AP+1、MP+3の代わりに）。
languages.original_text: While the Commissar's ally is under the effects of At All Costs!, that ally suffers +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} but gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} (instead of +1 AP and +3 MP).

traits.locale_text: コミッサーの味方が地獄へ叩き込めの効果を受けている間、その味方は被ダメージが+50%されるが、APが+2、MPが+4される（AP+1、MP+3の代わりに）。

languages.text: Когда союзник комиссара получает эффект от способности Задать им жару!, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, наносимый этому союзнику, увеличивается на 50%, но также этот союзник получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} (вместо +1 ОД и +3 ОП).
languages.original_text: While the Commissar's ally is under the effects of At All Costs!, that ally suffers +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} but gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} (instead of +1 AP and +3 MP).

traits.locale_text: Когда союзник комиссара получает эффект от способности Задать им жару!, урон, наносимый этому союзнику, увеличивается на 50%, но также этот союзник получает 2 ОД и 4 ОП (вместо 1 ОД и 3 ОП).
Когда союзник комиссара получает эффект от способности Задать им жару!, урон, наносимый этому союзнику, увеличивается на 50%, но также этот союзник получает 2 ОД и 4 ОП (вместо 1 ОД и 3 ОП).

languages.text: Komiser'in dost birimi, {g|f:cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}Canın Pahasına!{/g} kabiliyetinin etkisi altındayken +%50 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} maruz kalır ancak +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} ve +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} (+1 EP ve +3 HP yerine) kazanır.
languages.original_text: While the Commissar's ally is under the effects of {g|f:cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}At All Costs!{/g}, that ally suffers +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} but gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} (instead of +1 AP and +3 MP).
